# EMP1 < 10<sup>-4</sup>

## CT<sub>min</sub>

```{r}
gwas_cold_g %>%
  filter(EMP1 < 10^-4) %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling("striped") %>%
  scroll_box(width = "100%", height = "100%")
```

## CT<sub>max</sub>

```{r}
gwas_hot_g %>%
  filter(EMP1 < 10^-4) %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling("striped") %>%
  scroll_box(width = "100%", height = "100%")
```

There are very few genes below the 10<sup>-4</sup> threshold.
